tma.name: http://www.gooseworks.org/IS13250.xml
tma.description: This is a simplified version of the core TMA implicitly defined by the Topic Maps Reference Model.

property.name: UniqueName
property.description: This property stores the implicit name of assertion types and roles provided by the <name> elements inside assertion type definitions in TMAs. Explicitly defining this property has the advantage that assertion types and roles can be identified by their name in queries.

property.name: a-sidp
property.description: This property is used to express the subject of an assertion (the A-topic). Every value of this property represents exactly one assertion (the proxy for a relationship) by connecting the T-,R-,x-, and A-topics of an assertion. Note that C-topics are only represented implicitly in this simplified IS13250 TMA, mostly in order to keep the a-sidp's value type as simple as possible.
